events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will contact you soon for the next steps.
Your initial screening interview is scheduled for tomorrow to discuss your experience and skills.
Thank you for confirming the interview time. We look forward to speaking with you.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next Monday to evaluate your coding abilities.
You successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback from the engineering team.
The HR interview is scheduled for later this week to discuss salary expectations and company culture.
You completed the HR interview and we appreciate your openness discussing your career goals.
An official job offer has been proposed to you, including details on compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the job offer and the recruitment process so far.
We are thrilled to hear that you have accepted our offer and will be joining our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with access to all necessary tools and an introductory schedule.
Your hiring process is now complete, and we are excited to officially welcome you to our company.
